column2: School of Liberal Arts & Social Sciences (Cohort)

column11: This dataset compares retention and graduation outcomes for transfer students across CCSU’s schools: Liberal Arts & Social Sciences, Business, Education & Professional Studies, and Engineering, Science & Technology. It reports cohort sizes from 2013–2023, alongside university-wide second-year retention and four-year graduation percentages. The data highlights differences in cohort sizes and persistence trends between schools, with engineering and business showing larger transfer cohorts compared to education and liberal arts.
